DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim observational study collect data child Prader-Willi Syndrome , treat off-label Norditropin® 12 month seek approval Norditropin® treatment Prader-Willi Syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Observational Study Efficacy Safety Norditropin® Children With Prader-Willi Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Informed consent obtain trialrelated activity Genetically diagnose PraderWilli Syndrome Received least one dose Norditropin® treatment Prepubertal start treatment ; assess Tanner stage 1 , testicular volume 4ml ( accord Tanner 1976 ) Pretreatment Growth Hormone preparation prior treatment Norditropin®
